contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally. How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week, Marketplace's Queena Kim faces off against host Mark Garrison in our weekly Silicon Tally quiz. Play along at home, below.
title: Google buys Nest plus a silly mix-up: This week's Silicon Tally
teaser: This week's Silicon Tally has some interesting Google & Nest news. How closely have you been following the tech happenings this week?
description: This week's Silicon Tally has some interesting Google & Nest news. How closely have you been following the tech happenings this week?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, January 17, 2014
